name: Airavath Foundation
briefDescription: MissionTo improve Accessibility & Smart Living with TechnologyVisionA world in which every human is equally able and every technology is connected.Short Time Goal: Creating an affordable wearable glasses for Visually Impaired Person which will increase self-confidence and a sense of security by assisting in reading printed text, navigation and performing daily tasks independently with the use of technological developments.Long Time Goal: Creating a Bionic Eye which will replace all human vision issues at an affordable cost. Creating a smart living system which will connect all hardware and software regardless of connectivity, manufacturer or language barrier.
